item.description:
We will be camping Saturday night before the Hale Zealand hike. Want to join us?

RSVP and let me know- I'll know the weather for next weekend soon and will reserve a campsite close by. Sugarloaf is my first choice for this location.

We will split the campsite cost if we need an extra site. BYO food and drinks for potluck.
I have extra gear but need to know if you need to borrow it.
item.how_to_find_us: location will be shared with other campers
item.name: Camp and Hike White Mountains
